channel.title: I cannot shoot and select weapon with the mouse while moving (with video)
channel.description:
As New Xen update came out, I started a new game from chapter 14 and I encountered an issue. I am not able to shoot and select weapon using a mouse while moving, I have to stand still to shoot. but if I replaced my primary attack button to one of the keyboard buttons then it works as demonstrated within the video below [https://imgur.com/a/XTJySdU](https://imgur.com/a/XTJySdU)
NOTE: the issue is not the mouse, because I used a different mouse and still same result I even re-installed the game, I am also using a laptop the same laptop where I played this game before and it was working fine
